biotools.summary:
ddcMD is a fully GPU-accelerated molecular dynamics program for the Martini force field.
ddcMDconverter should be used to convert GROMACS inputs to ddcMD inputs

bioschemas.name: ddcMD
bioschemas.summary:
ddcMD is a fully GPU-accelerated molecular dynamics program for the Martini force field.
ddcMDconverter should be used to convert GROMACS inputs to ddcMD inputs
